display_long_description:
The Dream Dimension is an immersive exploration game where you enter various whimsical dream worlds while collecting dream shards along the way. Collecting dream shards will open up new worlds to explore. There are 16 unique dream worlds with a total of 50 dream shards. 

Each environment is uniquely crafted, ranging from serene, otherworldly landscapes to eerie and abandoned sci-fi civilizations. Discover magical ruins, traverse alien structures, explore fantasy villages, climb giant mushrooms, and much more! The Dream Dimension is not about the destination but the journey. Take your time and enjoy the environments. 

The primary means of traveling in The Dream Dimension is walking or running but there are many opportunities to climb as well. There are a variety of settings to suit all comfort levels of movement. Every world has climbing routes and surfaces as well for those who like to climb. Climbing is not required to see everything though it does provide some nice views and a workout!
